page.title: 03Wingate - By Pass
page.content: One of the{main routes}from the{A19 to{Durham,}the{A181,}passes through part of Wingate. The{B1280}forms the {main street}of the village. These two {roads cross}on the northern side of the village. This caused{considerable {congestion}at{peak traffic times. Through traffic was held up and local traffic sometimes brought to a standstill. Because of this it was decided to{build a bypass}to the north. The villagers had wanted this for a number of years but money had never been available to begin the project. The{EEC,}however, was able to{provide the{finance}for the work to be carried out. The road was{completed}in just over {eighteen months.}The through traffic now passes unhindered and local driving is much more relaxed.
